field.name: folder
field.label: Image Folder
field.description: Source folder for images.

field.name: thumbw
field.label: Thumbnail Width
field.description: Set the width of thumbnails (in pixels). Default: 120

field.name: thumbh
field.label: Thumbnail Height
field.description: Set the height of thumbnails (in pixels). Default: 90

field.name: zoom
field.label: Thumbnail type
field.description: Select method to build thumbnails.

field.name: single
field.label: Single
field.description: When enabled, only the first thumbnail will be shown in the content item. Disable to show all thumbnails.

field.name: padding
field.label: Padding
field.description: Space between image wrapper and content. Default: 10

field.name: margin
field.label: Margin
field.description: Space between viewport and image wrapper. Default: 20

field.name: opacity
field.label: Opacity
field.description: When enabled, transparency of content is changed for elastic transitions.

field.name: cyclic
field.label: Cyclic
field.description: When true, galleries will be cyclic, allowing you to keep pressing next/back.

field.name: autoScale
field.label: Autoscale
field.description: If enabled, image is scaled to fit in viewport.

field.name: centerOnScroll
field.label: Center on scroll
field.description: When enabled, image is centered while scrolling page.

field.name: hideOnOverlayClick
field.label: Hide on overlay click
field.description: Toggle if clicking the overlay should close image.

field.name: hideOnContentClick
field.label: Hide on content click
field.description: Toggle if clicking the content should close image.

field.name: overlayShow
field.label: Enable overlay
field.description: Toggle overlay shadow.

field.name: overlayOpacity
field.label: Overlay opacity
field.description: Opacity of the overlay (from 0 to 1; default: 0.7)

field.name: overlayColor
field.label: Overlay color
field.description: Color of the overlay. Default: 000000

field.name: titleShow
field.label: Show info area
field.description: Toggle Title/description display area.

field.name: title
field.label: Show title
field.description: Toggle title text (if available).

field.name: description
field.label: Show description
field.description: Toggle description text (if available).

field.name: numbers
field.label: Numbering
field.description: Toggle image numbering on titles.

field.name: titlePosition
field.label: Title position
field.description: The position of title.

field.name: transitionIn
field.label: Start transition
field.description: The initial transition type.

field.name: transitionOut
field.label: Exit transition
field.description: The final transition type.

field.name: speedIn
field.label: Start speed
field.description: Speed of initial transition (in milliseconds). Default: 300

field.name: speedOut
field.label: Exit speed
field.description: Speed of final transition (in milliseconds). Default: 300

field.name: changeSpeed
field.label: Change speed
field.description: Speed of image change (in milliseconds). Default: 300

field.name: changeFade
field.label: Fade speed
field.description: Speed of image fade (in milliseconds). Default: 300

field.name: showCloseButton
field.label: Show Close button
field.description: Enable or disable close button.

field.name: showNavArrows
field.label: Show navigation buttons
field.description: Enable or disable navigation buttons.

field.name: forcepng
field.label: Use PNG thumbnails
field.description: When enabled, all thumbnails will be store in PNG format with transparent background.

field.name: thumbbkg
field.label: Thumbnail background color
field.description: Background color for thumbnails. Default: FFFFFF

field.name: mousewheel
field.label: Mouse wheel navigation
field.description: Enable or disable mouse wheel navigation.

field.name: css
field.label: CSS load
field.description: Load CSS. Disable if you want to use CSS from some other place.
